TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Sado, title = Sado, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sado} }

S.FORM: alang Sado ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Kongbu go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 98 buwan, 272 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 90% kyan ku 246 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 10% kyan ku 26 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 85%, Kebalan 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Sado hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Sado hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Sado hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Sado hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Sado hya' ga Tafalong. tay mkyahu' na Sado hya' ga Kalotong. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Sado ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Kongbo go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 98 bowan, 272 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 90% kyan ko 246 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 10% kyan ko 26 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 85%, Kebalan 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Sado hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Sado hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Sado hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Sado hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Sado hya' ga Tafalong. tay mkyaho' na Sado hya' ga Kalotong. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
